price: Wọ́n sọ pé: “A fi Allāhu búra! Dájúdájú ìwọ sì wà nínú àṣìṣe rẹ ti àtijọ́ (nípa ìfẹ́ Yūsuf).”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
